lejos.robotics.objectdetection
Interface FeatureListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
FusorDetector
public interface FeatureListener

Any class implementing this interface and registering with a FeatureDetector will receive notifications when a feature is detected.

Author:
BB based on concepts by Lawrie Griffiths
See Also:
FeatureDetector.addListener(FeatureListener)

Method Summary
 void featureDetected(Feature feature, FeatureDetector detector)
          The angle and range (in a RangeReading) of a feature is reported when a feature is detected.
 

Method Detail

featureDetected

void featureDetected(Feature feature,
                     FeatureDetector detector)
The angle and range (in a RangeReading) of a feature is reported when a feature is detected.

Parameters:
feature - The RangeReading, which contains angle and range.
